entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
